answers.answer: Congrats and good luck. It's not always a given the if you have had GD with one that you will have it with your next. Your chances of it are just higher. I am in much the same boat, but got to wait till around 26 weeks till I know for sure.
I had GD with my daughter but not with this little guy, my doctor thought the same thing I was tested twice and am now 35 weeks and still no GD so there is a good chance u won't.

I had it with my son. I get tested Tuesday 12 weeks just in case. And even if I pass I'll get tested at the normal time too. I'm exercising this time around and have actually lost weight but I'm still worried. I'm overweight. I'm pretty curvy. My mom had it too. But she only had it with her 1st baby and not with the other 2. That kind of gives me hope. I also don't feel like I have it this time around. I don't get the low blood sugar shakes or anything.There's hope for the both of us. :)

question: 5 weeks today! But my doc said I might have ges diabetes with this one too ;( but I am determined not to so I'm going to try and eat really healthy!
title: yay! and whaa!
